Mr. Chairman He is speaking of the merchant seamen’s compensation. He has advanced the opinion that these insurance funds are con» tributory in nature and he asks the respective proportions in which contributions are made, by the government, by the shipowner and by the crew member.

Mr. Smallwood My answer is, none. The whole amount is paid by the government in respect of the period after June 30, 1941, during which the merchant seamen was occupied in dangerous waters”.
